sourcesContent: import { Mutation } from "react-apollo" import { TOGGLE_CART_MUTATION } from "./Cart" import Link from "next/link" import NavStyles from "./styles/NavStyles" import User from "./User" import SignOut from "./SignOut" import CartCount from './CartCount' const Nav = () => ( {({ data: { me } }) => ( Shop {me && ( <> Sell Orders Account {toggleCart => } )} {!me && ( Sign In )} )} ) export default Nav
